demolition

Class BomberMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.BomberMap

  • public class BomberMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the map layout of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BomberMap()
      Creates a new BomberMap object.

    • Method Summary

      Demolish the "Broken" Tile on the given location.

      Draws the respective Tile sprite on the app window.

      Returns the location of the Goal Tile.

      Returns the initial location of the Player.

      Returns the list of initial location of the RedEnemy objects.

      Returns the Tile type on the specified location of the map.

      Returns the list of initial location of the YellowEnemy objects.
      void read(java.lang.String filename)
      Reads the given configuration .txt file which contains the Tile types and characters on each coordinate.
      static void setup(PApplet app)
      Loads the required four Tile objects (Empty, Broken, Wall, Goal) and their respective sprites.

        Creates a new BomberMap object.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup(PApplet app)
        Loads the required four Tile objects (Empty, Broken, Wall, Goal) and their respective sprites. Require Papplet object.
        Parameters:
        app - App of the game.

      • read

        public void read(java.lang.String filename)
          throws demolition.InvalidConfigurationException
        Reads the given configuration .txt file which contains the Tile types and characters on each coordinate. The .txt file will be checked if the map layout is valid before pairing the Tile obejcts to their respective locations.
        Parameters:
        filename -
        Throws:
        demolition.InvalidConfigurationException

      • demolish

        public void demolish(Tuple location)
        Demolish the "Broken" Tile on the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - Location of the "Broken" Tile

      • getTileType

        public java.lang.String getTileType(int x,
                                    int y)
        Returns the Tile type on the specified location of the map. Requires the coordinates of the desired location.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the location
        y - y coordinate of the location
        Returns:
        Tile type

        public Tuple getPlayerInitialLocation()
        Returns the initial location of the Player.
